TestCase.name: testCannotRemoveRankNumberColumn1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, rank_num FROM ( SELECT *, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY a ORDER BY rowtime DESC) as rank_num FROM MyTable) WHERE rank_num >= 1 AND rank_num < 2

LogicalProject(a=[$0], rank_num=[$4]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(>=($4, 1), <($4, 2))]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], rowtime=[$3], rank_num=[RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY $0 ORDER BY $3 DESC NULLS LAST)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, rank_num]) +- FlinkLogicalRank(rankType=[RANK], rankRange=[rankStart=1, rankEnd=1], partitionBy=[a], orderBy=[rowtime DESC], select=[a, rowtime, rank_num]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, rowtime]) +- FlinkLogicalDataStreamTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

TestCase.name: testCannotRemoveRankNumberColumn2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, rank_num FROM ( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY a ORDER BY rowtime DESC) as rank_num FROM MyTable) WHERE rank_num >= 1 AND rank_num < 3

LogicalProject(a=[$0], rank_num=[$4]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(>=($4, 1), <($4, 3))]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], rowtime=[$3], rank_num=[ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY $0 ORDER BY $3 DESC NULLS LAST)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, rank_num]) +- FlinkLogicalRank(rankType=[ROW_NUMBER], rankRange=[rankStart=1, rankEnd=2], partitionBy=[a], orderBy=[rowtime DESC], select=[a, rowtime, rank_num]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, rowtime]) +- FlinkLogicalDataStreamTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

TestCase.name: testCannotRemoveRankNumberColumn3
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a FROM ( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY a ORDER BY rowtime DESC) as rank_num FROM MyTable) WHERE rank_num >= 1 AND rank_num < 2

LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(>=($4, 1), <($4, 2))]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], rowtime=[$3], rank_num=[ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY $0 ORDER BY $3 DESC NULLS LAST)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a]) +- FlinkLogicalRank(rankType=[ROW_NUMBER], rankRange=[rankStart=1, rankEnd=1], partitionBy=[a], orderBy=[rowtime DESC], select=[a, rowtime]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, rowtime]) +- FlinkLogicalDataStreamTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

TestCase.name: testCouldRemoveRankNumberColumn
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, rank_num FROM ( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY a ORDER BY rowtime DESC) as rank_num FROM MyTable) WHERE rank_num >= 1 AND rank_num < 2

LogicalProject(a=[$0], rank_num=[$4]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(>=($4, 1), <($4, 2))]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], rowtime=[$3], rank_num=[ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY $0 ORDER BY $3 DESC NULLS LAST)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, 1:BIGINT AS rank_num]) +- FlinkLogicalRank(rankType=[ROW_NUMBER], rankRange=[rankStart=1, rankEnd=1], partitionBy=[a], orderBy=[rowtime DESC], select=[a, rowtime]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, rowtime]) +- FlinkLogicalDataStreamTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
